alert.note: Alert for Eastern Ascension; Iberville; St. James; Western Ascension (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 21 at 4:43PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...An area of strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Ascension, northwestern St. James and east central Iberville Parishes through 515 PM CDT... At 442 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms near Geismar, or near Gonzales, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Gonzales, Donaldsonville, St. Gabriel, Sorrento, Port Vincent, Prairieville and Geismar. This includes Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 170 and 186. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Ascension; Iberville; St. James; Western Ascension
